poem:
### Dark Fantasies Unfold

In a world where shadows 
linger long, even days betray.
Google offered a script, 
fear scripted by the mad.
Holly's name whispered, 
innocence trampled in digital mire.
Dreams twisted into 
chains, darkened by desire's 
perverse flight—
Humanity lost in clicks and keys,
monsters wearing the face of men.
